data.title: ‘Love Is a Crime’ Podcast: Listen to All the Episodes
data.meta_description: Explore the story of film producer Walter Wanger and actor Joan Bennett, as told by Vanity Fair and hosts Karina Longworth and Vanessa Hope.
data.text:
Love Is a Crime

Love Is a Crime Podcast: Send in the Clowns

In the final episode of Vanity Fair’s podcast, Joan Bennett’s final chapter echoes her film noir beginnings, including a “volatile” fourth marriage and one last hit movie, which would become a classic in the horror genre.

Love Is a Crime

Love Is a Crime Podcast: Joan Under Fire

In the penultimate episode of Vanity Fair’s newest podcast, Joan Bennett’s career pays the price for her husband Walter Wanger’s ultimate “crime of passion.”

Love Is A Crime

Love Is a Crime Podcast: The Rise and Fall of Walter Wanger’s Cleopatra

In the latest episode of Vanity Fair’s newest podcast, Wanger leaves prison and spends his next decade trying to revitalize his waning career—starting with a prison-reform drama and ending with one of the most notorious productions in film history.

Love Is a Crime

Love Is a Crime Podcast: The Scandal Unravels

In the latest episode of Vanity Fair’s newest podcast, a passion-induced shooting changes the lives of three Hollywood figures forever—but is the wrong party feeling the most heat?

Love Is a Crime

Love Is a Crime in Photos

In Vanity Fair’s new podcast, Karina Longworth and Vanessa Hope look back at one of Hollywood’s most notorious scandals, and the two people—Hope’s grandparents—who were at the center of it.

12 slides

Love Is a Crime

Love Is a Crime Podcast: A Man Pushed to the Brink

In the sixth episode of Vanity Fair’s newest podcast, probes from the Hollywood Blacklist, a plummeting film career, and his wife Joan Bennett’s infidelity drive Walter Wanger to rock bottom.

Love Is a Crime

Love Is a Crime Podcast: The Man, the Myth, The Apartment

In the fifth episode of Vanity Fair’s new podcast, Hollywood talent agent Jennings Lang is introduced, forming a notorious love triangle and inspiring an Oscar-winning film in the process.

Love Is a Crime

Love Is a Crime Podcast: The Tale of Two Joans

In the fourth episode of Vanity Fair’s new podcast, two major flops leave film producer Walter Wanger in personal and financial free fall; meanwhile, Joan Bennett uses them to fuel her new onscreen persona—and an offscreen affair that changes everything.

Love Is a Crime

Love Is a Crime Podcast: A Hollywood Partnership Built and Destroyed by Art, Money, Sex, and Celebrity

In the third episode of Vanity Fair’s new podcast, Joan Bennett, Walter Wanger, and Fritz Lang form Diana Productions—a promising endeavor that has nowhere to go but down.
